form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to protect the use of risk-based approaches by owners and operators of certain pipeline facilities, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Modern Risk Detection Act of 2025.
Section 60102 of title 49, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: The Secretary shall ensure that the standards prescribed under this chapter allow for the use, to the maximum extent practicable, of risk-based approaches, concepts, or principles in complying with those standards.
